file_content.text: [Countless Revanites and powerful creatures stand between you and Revan within the Temple of Sacrifice. You will need help, but the coalition forces are divided and uneasy.]
[You could galvanize the coalition forces by invoking a spirit of cooperation and helping them prepare for a joint military attack on the temple...]
[...or you could gather a large strike team of elite heroes from within your faction to storm the Temple of Sacrifice.]
[You may return to this console to make your choice at any time.]
[You may reset this mission at any time to alter your choice.]
